segments.text: I was surprised to see how few people you have on-site . You provide a wide range of goods and services but have a very small workforce .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It depends on the time of year . At peak times we hire in casual workers to help with packing and dispatch . We also contract out certain services all year round , for example , cleaning . We run a very tight operation !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you handle the recruiting yourselves ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sometimes we use a local employment agency . It depends on the job .
segments.speaker: S2
